title: Kourtney Kardashian cuts a cool look in leather as she leaves her grandmother Mary Jo's house in LA
text:
Of the Kardashian/Jenner dynasty, the woman that gets overlooked the most is grandmother Mary Jo Campbell.

Kourtney Kardashian paid her dear grandma a visit Wednesday as she filmed for Keeping Up with the Kardashians.

She stepped out in a skintight long-sleeve grey shirt, which hugged her taut physique.

Grandma's girl: Kourtney Kardashian paid her dear grandma Mary Jo Campbell a visit Wednesday as she filmed for Keeping Up with the Kardashians

The shirt was tucked into a pair of black leather pants, also hugging her signature Kardashian curves.

She completed the ensemble with a pair of clear strappy stilettos, wearing her hair in long waves.

She and little sister Kim took to Instagram Sunday as they hit the road back to Los Angeles from Palm Springs, following Kim's birthday celebrations.

Kourtney sported a risque road trip look in a sheer white bodysuit, as she posted a snap from a convenience store on the way.

Serving body: She stepped out in a skintight long-sleeve grey shirt, which hugged her taut physique

Leather queen: The shirt was tucked into a pair of black leather pants, also hugging her signature Kardashian curves

She completed the look with some cotton short shorts and a pair of matching white sneakers.

Meanwhile, the birthday girl opted for a chic black leather look as her road trip ensemble.

Kim posted a photo of herself walking across the parking lot in a leather jacket over a hoodie with matching leather pants and stilettos.

Kourtney also posted some video to her story of the gorgeous SoCal sunset as they hit the road.

She posted a video earlier as she and Kim visited their local Ulta to see the brand new KKW Beauty display, which is possibly Kim's best gift yet.

Road trip look: Kourtney Kardashian sported a risque road trip look in a sheer white bodysuit, as she posted a snap from a convenience store on the way home from Palm Springs

SoCal sunset: Kourtney also posted some video to her story of the gorgeous SoCal sunset as they hit the road

She found Kim strolling the aisle and feigned excitement, saying: 'Woah, it's Kim Kardashian West!'

Kim also posted a photo of the display, featuring a life-size photo of herself, captioned: 'Today is the day!!! I’m so excited that @kkwbeauty is now available at all @ultabeauty stores! This is such a dream come true!!'

Despite it being her birthday, Kim also treated all her friends to individual goody bags filled with all her products.

The 38-year-old was in Palm Springs for the weekend with her best friends and family.

'Ok, so for my birthday, all my besties are opening up [their goody bags],' she said.

Kim was surrounded by ten of her closest friends including sisters Kourtney, 40, and Khloe, 35.

In stores: She posted a video earlier as she and Kim visited their local Ulta to see the brand new KKW Beauty display, which is possibly Kim's best gift yet

She's famous: She found Kim strolling the aisle and feigned excitement, saying: 'Woah, it's Kim Kardashian West!'

Best birthday ever: Kim also posted a photo of the display, featuring a life-size photo of herself, captioned: 'Today is the day!!! I’m so excited that @kkwbeauty is now available at all @ultabeauty stores! This is such a dream come true!!'

Khloe was in the middle of the group on the floor wearing a Nike crop top and tights.

The gift bags included various Skims products including bras and socks as well as her fragrances and a Selfish book.

'So we got perfume, everyone got a Selfish book, new slides and socks,' she said.

Kim's birthday trip saw her enjoy a special dinner on Saturday night where she got her makeup done by sister Kylie Jenner.

Following the home cooked meal, the group played some rounds of Cards Against Humanity.
description: She and little sister Kim took to Instagram Sunday as they hit the road back to Los Angeles from Palm Springs, following Kim's birthday celebrations. The party came with Skims goody bags for guests.
